website_summaries.verdict: Popular wrap style of sunglasses and lenses that also features a desirable design on the frames.
pros: Tough polycomposite lenses should stand up to potential rough treatment
Frame consists of a resin material that's lightweight but that also provides the toughness you'll want
Wrap style sunglasses look quite a bit different from other Gucci men's sunglasses styles
cons: These sunglasses tend to run larger than they look, which will disappoint some

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pair, look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I buy. Fits perfect! However, the tortoise patterns are not identical making these sunnies unique. Thus, many compliments (especially, from the wife!). Once, you purchase them, do know that they'll be hard to find again due to the fact that many sellers are not carrying them anymore, so get them while you can.
customer_reviews.author: Fin. Adviser

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Reasonable Cost
customer_reviews.text: I tired the glasses on at a Nordstrom and really fell in love with the look, feel, and weight of the sunglasses. I knew it was overpriced and came to Amazon and save over $100. When the sunglasses arrived it wasn't exactly the same fit as those in the store - the hinge, temple, and ear piece are slightly wider than expected so the sunglasses do not fit snugly on my face and have a tendency to slip when you tilt your head down. Other than that, these are what you expect - fashionable yet masculine with clean appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tint shade and color :)
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are spectacular!! The lens are not that dark but just the perfect tint. Yes may be a bit pricey but you get what you pay for and these are surely quality frames. I'm very happy and the case is nice that comes with it. I don't leave home without them . I feel confident and get compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a friend and was completely happy with them. They came with a box, authenticity paper, cleaning cloth, and a case. I ended up saving about 50% by buying these off amazon instead of in the store. The black color has lenses that almost have a purple tint when wearing them, however is a dark grey.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice look and sturdy too. I bought this a few months back and my husband had something fall on his head while they were on. It cracked the lens but the frame is so sturdy that it saved his head from damage. it was a overhead speaker. Pretty much saved him from harm. i am ordering a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Nu

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses for my boyfriend and they're so much nicer then the picture. They fit him perfectly and are a great everyday pair of sunglasses. Unfortunately UPS is a horrible company that I've had repeated problems with; they claimed to try to deliver it three times but I didn't get a single notice (this has happened many times before and is no reflection on the seller.) Despite that, it was fast delivery and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hay

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. I was looking for sunglasses to replace my prescription pair since I got LASIK surgery. With the cost of these, I couldn't pass it up.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. L.

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these sunglasses after losing my beloved pair. these were actually slightly bigger than my original pair and did not fit my face. easy to return. very happy with the customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline J. Damore

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses... they are elegant and stylish. I would recommend these sunglasses if you are in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Baron1120

customer_reviews.title: Great! A very nice product! Love it! You can buy it that will not regret! Very good product for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Great! A very nice product! Love it! You can buy it that will not regret! Very good product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Great look
customer_reviews.text: These Sunglasses have a great fit, and they look great. The lense's very noce also, reduces glare but they are not very dark. This was a great deal for my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Britni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quility and I got it on time.... love it
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with how quick they came and the fact that it came with the authenticity card makes it even better
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: These are authentic. Great look and style.Very classy. They are a little large though on the sides i have a smaller head but they still are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: kenny.mcd1

customer_reviews.title: Incredible style with a perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box and worn they fit perfect and feel like I have worn for years. I have recieved a bunch of compliments on their styling too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah L. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them .. Thanks you Amazon for the hook up ..
customer_reviews.author: bryan bellamine

customer_reviews.title: Gucci love em
customer_reviews.text: Great sunnies authentic with all the expected extras Thank you so much I've wanted these for ages and your price made it very affordable
customer_reviews.author: KWL

customer_reviews.title: Good Sunglases
customer_reviews.text: good product I liked the design and are very comfortable recommend them enough the modern design is the only thing good to large faces are small
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Must buy here!
customer_reviews.text: 100% authentic! Ive owned two pairs prior from nordstroms and these are no differant! I wish i bought the first two here as much as i lose them!
customer_reviews.author: ANVIL

product_meta.title: Gucci 1000/S Wrap Sunglasses
product_meta.description: GUCCI 1000/S 0VDI HAVANA 57/15-140 COLOR: HAVANA SIZE:57 Comes with Original Case, Certificate of Authenticity and Cleaning Cloth. We guarantee that this item is 100% Authentic or 100% Money Back Guarantee, and we want you to feel comfortable buying from us. We stand behind our products and will work hard to do everything we can to resolve any issues that may come up. Please feel confident buying from us as we guarantee the highest quality and service in the latest fashion. We value our eBay reputation highly, and hope to bring honesty to the eBay community. Please look at our eBay feedback. Returns & Exchange: If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your frames, you may return them, within 30 days for a refund or Exchange. Refunds will be issued within 5 business days from receipt of the item Shipping costs will not be refunded. Packages must contain al of the original items or returns will not be accepted. If you opted for FREE SHIPPING keep in mind shipping costs will be deducted from your order upon return. Please contact us at via Ebay to let us know about the return and you will be issued RMA #. The item must be in brand new perfect condition, the same as when you received it. All returned merchandise must be in its original saleable condition when received. Please be sure to include all of the original material that we sent with the merchandise. Customer Service Information: We pride ourselves on maintaining the highest level of customer service. Our customers know that each transaction is guaranteed to meet their satisfaction level. If a problem arises, we will fix it.
